DeathClock:DeathsCalling.NAME: Death's Calling
DESCRIPTIONS: Applies Summon Death on you and enemies at the start of each turn

DeathClock:DeathsAmendment.NAME: Death's Amendment
DeathClock:DeathsAmendment.FLAVOR: Possibly the greatest deal known to Death
DESCRIPTIONS: Decreases the amount of stacks of Summon Death required by 1
